title: Citrus lemon orange mandarin grafting  Tree grafting technique # 91

tasks.task: Load a pickup truck with hay.
subtasks: Approach the hay pile.
Lift hay bales onto the pickup bed.
Stack hay bales neatly in the truck bed.

tasks.task: Drive the pickup truck to the field.
subtasks: Enter the pickup truck.
Fasten seatbelt.
Start the engine.
Drive the truck to the destination field.

tasks.task: Unload hay from the pickup truck.
subtasks: Park the truck near the field.
Open the pickup bed.
Remove hay bales from the truck bed.
Stack or arrange hay bales in the field.

tasks.task: Cut hay with a riding mower.
subtasks: Mount the riding mower.
Drive the mower through the hayfield.
Mow the hay, cutting it to the desired height.

tasks.task: Bales hay using a baler.
subtasks: Operate the baler to collect cut hay.
Press hay into tightly rolled bales.
Secure bales when full.

tasks.task: Drive the baler to the hay yard.
subtasks: Guide the baler towards the hay storage area.
Align the baler with the hay pile.
Position the bales onto the hay yard.

tasks.task: Remove excess hay from the baler.
subtasks: Discharge any remaining hay from the baler.
Clean the baler to prevent problems.

tasks.task: Apply fertilizer to the field.
subtasks: Assemble the fertilizer spreader.
Drive the spreader over the field.
Distribute fertilizer evenly across the field.

tasks.task: Plant seeds using a seed planter.
subtasks: Prepare the seed planter for planting.
Drive the planter through the field, planting seeds at the correct depth and spacing.

tasks.task: Operate a sprayer to apply pesticides.
subtasks: Load the sprayer with the pesticide.
Drive the sprayer through the field, applying the pesticide uniformly.

tasks.task: Clean the farming equipment.
subtasks: Disassemble the machinery.
Wash each component thoroughly.

tasks.task: Maintain the horse and buggy.
subtasks: Check the horse’s health and comfort.
Clean and groom the horse.

tasks.task: Coach the student driver.
subtasks: Give instructions on driving the buggy safely.
Observe the student’s driving technique.

tasks.task: Patrol the farm property.
subtasks: Walk around the farm perimeter.
Check for any signs of damage or trespassing.

tasks.task: Prepare meal for hired hands.
subtasks: Procure ingredients from the kitchen.
Prepare and cook a nutritious meal.

tasks.task: Feed the chickens.
subtasks: Collect eggs from the chicken coop.
Distribute feed to the chickens.

tasks.task: Groom the chickens.
subtasks: Brush the chickens to keep them整洁.

tasks.task: Repair a broken fence.
subtasks: Locate the damaged section of the fence.
Gather and prepare the necessary materials.
Replace or mend the fence panels.

tasks.task: Hunt small game on the farm.
subtasks: Set up hunting equipment in a safe area.

tasks.task: Apply agricultural film to protect crops.
subtasks: Measure the appropriate amount of film for the field.
Roll out the agricultural film over the planted area.
Secure the edges of the film to prevent wind damage.

tasks.task: Operate an irrigation system.
subtasks: Start the irrigation pump or valves.
Adjust the flow rate to match the crop needs.
Monitor the system for leaks or issues.

tasks.task: Transport livestock to the market.
subtasks: Gather the animals to be sold.
Load them securely into a transport vehicle.

tasks.task: Give a riding lesson to a student.
subtasks: Prepare the riding area.
Demonstrate riding techniques and safety.
Supervise the student on horseback.

tasks.task: Plant cover crops.
subtasks: Choose suitable species for cover.
Prepare the soil by tilling.
Broadcast seeds or plant using a drill.

tasks.task: Attend a farm meeting.
subtasks: Locate the meeting location, which is in the office.

tasks.task: Handle a medical emergency on the farm.
Organize a community work day at the farm.
Collect milk from the dairy cows.
subtasks: Check the milking schedule.
Prepare the milking equipment.
Attach milking machines or cups.

tasks.task: Analyze soil samples to determine nutrient needs.
subtasks: Collect soil samples from various fields.
Submit the samples to a laboratory for analysis.
Review the results to determine fertilizer requirements.

tasks.task: Repair a broken ride mower.
subtasks: Identify the problem with the mower.

tasks.task: Inspect farm crops for pests and disease.
Treat sick pigs with medication.
subtasks: Identify pigs showing signs of illness.

tasks.task: Prepare farm for a holiday celebration.
Start a compost pile for organic waste.
subtasks: Collect kitchen scraps and yard waste.

tasks.task: Harvest ripe vegetables from the garden.
subtasks: Identify which vegetables are ready to be picked.

tasks.task: Drive a cart to the field.
subtasks: Pull the cart up to the field.
Unload any necessary tools or materials for the job.
